articles.description: There’s a deeper meaning to “Judah Smith Interlude,” a nearly five-minute rant from the controversial preacher that’s got Del Rey’s fans all riled up.
articles.content: A track on Lana Del Reys long-windedly titled ninth studio album, Did You Know Theres a Tunnel Under Ocean Blvd, has launched the singers massive fanbase into a frenzy. The song, Judah Smith Interlud… [+4714 chars]
